content: X-DR T MX Threaded drop rod Threaded drop rod for use with battery-actuated tools ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Fastening elements- - - ### FEATURES:Features Time-saving solution – pre-assembled ¼” threaded rod, delivered ready to install using battery-actuated tools Drop rod is considered a rigid system – no extra attachment to the ceiling grid needed (as per NEC 300.11) One-handed installation – slide-in connection grips the baseplate to the BX tool Safer and higher-productivity method for overhead applications – battery-actuated tools with a compatible pole tool to remove the need for lifts and ladders Combustion-free installation with BX tools – no gas cans or powder cartridges to store and dispose of Applications Fastening overhead electrical hanging systems Works with all Hilti cable and conduit hanging elements (data hooks, batwings and MC stackers) For approval or certificate information, please see individual items. ### TECHNICAL DATA: Application: Suspended systems Material: Carbon steel For use with (tools): BX 3 Technical Data | Application | Suspended systems | Material | Carbon steel | For use with (tools) | BX 3 | Base materials | Concrete (soft), Concrete (lightweight over metal deck), Steel | Approvals (global) | UL, ICC ES | Type of rod | threaded | Environmental Conditions | Dry indoor | Product Class | Premium ### ITEMS- 2230630 - Drop rod X-DR 1 T MX - Package Size 50 pc - 2230631 - Drop rod X-DR 2 T MX - Package Size 25 pc - 2230632 - Drop rod X-DR 3 T MX - Package Size 25 pc - 2230633 - Drop rod X-DR 4 T MX - Package Size 25 pc - 2230634 - Drop rod X-DR 6 T MX - Package Size 25 pc
